    Zhichao Huang

    Algorithmic Engineer at JD Technology. Foucsing on GNNs, KG and LLM.

    üòÄ About Me

    I am now an algorithmic engineer at JD Technology. Before that, I participated in a half-a-year-long rotation training in the same company as a Doctor Management Trainee.

    I received my Ph.D. from Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen in 2021 under the supervision of Prof. Yunming Ye. My research areas are graph neural networks, knowledge graphs, spatio-temporal data mining and large language model and mainly focus on urban knowledge graph, question answering and knowledge reasoning.

    I am always open to collaborating with remote students and researchers who are interested in graph neural networks, knowldge graphs and spatio-temporal data mining, etc. Please feel free to contact me.
